rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The Armus have calmed down now.
Teeco was worried, so she came out
to have a look for herself.

rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0002
rows.name:
She was trying to look all calm and
controlled, but she was just putting
it on.

rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0003
rows.name:
She was in a right tizz really. I can
always tell. She can't look me in the
eyes when she's like that.

rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Hey, speaking of looking at things with
eyes... I saw you guys fighting the other
day! Awesome!

rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0005
rows.name:
You looked so cool! You just bashed
'em up like, POW! ...And SOCKK!
It was a real buzz to watch.

rows.label: tlk70000006_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I might try playing at being a Driver
instead of Armu experiments. Maybe I
can get one of them to be a Blade...
